taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Asteraceae;tribe Heliantheae;subtribe Marshalliinae;genus Marshallia;species mohrii;

bio:treatment.discussion: Marshallia mohrii grows in the southern Appalachians. It may be an allotetraploid derivative of diploids, probably M. grandiflora and either M. trinervia or M. graminifolia subsp. tenuifolia

references.reference: Watson, L. E., W. J. Elisens, and J. R. Estes. 1991. Cytogenetic and electrophoretic evidence for the allotetraploid origin of Marshallia mohrii (Asteraceae). Amer. J. Bot. 78: 408â€“416.
